data.text: Tailored Learning, Lasting Impact Wharton’s custom programs are built around your organization’s priorities, combining research-backed insights, immersive experiences, and flexible formats to develop agile leaders and deliver measurable results. Learn About Our Approach » Learning solutions for the way your people work today. At Wharton, we meet you where you are. Here are three ways your organization can tap into Wharton knowledge: LIVE ONLINE Direct interaction with Wharton faculty — live and in real time — through a fully synchronous learning experience. ON CAMPUS All-inclusive learning environment with concierge-style service that minimizes distraction for optimal learning. BLENDED AND ONLINE Faster ROI through program design that starts with live online and culminates with on-campus programming SMALL-GROUP OPEN ENROLLMENT Tuition beneﬁts available when you send four or more executives to any of our open-enrollment programs. Download our brochure to learn more: Download Brochure » The Learning Experience You can expect a curriculum that is anything but static: fully encompassing the realities of today’s disruptive business environment, but with a ﬁrm grounding in time-tested principles. Learn more about Wharton’s learning experience » Our Expertise Finance and Value Creation Leadership Development Marketing and Analytics Strategy and Innovation Partnering for Success We recognize the investment of time and resources required to develop learning solutions that transform organizations and deliver impact. See how some of our partners have achieved significant breakthroughs and return on their investment in executive education. Learn more about client partnerships » Wharton-Twitter Business Academy: A powerful investment in talent management Contact us to learn more about a partnership with Wharton. +1.215.898.1776 customprograms@wharton.upenn.edu Request Consult
